attributes.action: Introduce free prescriptions for people with mental health
attributes.additional_details: People who suffer with mental health suffer for various reasons, some reasons can often be financial. Adding the additional cost of prescription charges although low do add up and can add to additional money worries.
attributes.background: People suffering with mental health who have to medicate on the guidance of a professional GP to protect them and their families should not have to pay prescription costs for these medicines

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553376
